author: Chris York
title: #BagelGate Is A Thing, A Very Confusing Thing
text:
#BagelGate Is A Thing, A Very Confusing Thing 'HE'S GOT BAGEL, ON HIS HEAD!' 27/02/2017 12:11 | Updated 11 minutes ago Chris York Senior Editor, Huffington Post UK 
There were bagels, jeering, two women nearly had a fight and the police ended up intervening. 
Oh, and it happened on a train out of London. 
Thatâ€™s about all can be ascertained from one of the weirdest videos to hit Twitter in 2017 (make sure you watch the very last scene with the police). â€” dougie stewðŸ—¿ (@DougieStew) February 26, 2017 
HuffPost UK Comedy reached out to the man who filmed the video to ask for clarification but he appears to be as stumped as everyone else. @DougieStew I've watched this twice and I'm still confused. What's actually going on? â€” Chris York (@ChrisDYork) February 27, 2017 @ChrisDYork about 4 different story lines a at the same time... honestly like something straight out of black mirror. â€” dougie stewðŸ—¿ (@DougieStew) February 27, 2017 
Hereâ€™s a breakdown so far: 1) Woman has bagel on head 2) Different woman confronts another woman 3) Confrontation nearly escalates into full brawl 4) Much shouting
